column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////There's a free parking garage for all the retail shops in the area
column2: but it fills up quickly around Friday and Saturday dinner times. There tends be a wait at peak dinner times every day of the week. Fortunately
column3: the fast service makes up for it. Also
column4: for those who seek a good bowl of soup/pho/ramen on rainy days
column5: the garage isn't directly connected to Jinya
column6: so be sure to bring an umbrella...#firstworldproblems.
